title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unified knowledge access: Bridging data with generative AI agents  (AIM338)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 统一知识访问：通过生成式AI代理连接数据 (AIM338)
abstract: As organizations mature their generative AI strategy, more complex use cases emerge. Originally focused on unstructured data, organizations now require structured data as a source of knowledge for AI applications. This session will showcase a method for storing and accessing structured and unstructured data in tandem through an AI agent. Learn how to put text data into a vector store and create a text-to-SQL system with advanced knowledge bases, then efficiently direct user questions using AI agents for a smooth user experience. This approach demonstrates how to leverage both structured and unstructured data sources to enhance the capabilities of generative AI systems in enterprise environments.
abstract_cn: 随着组织逐步成熟其生成式AI战略，更复杂的用例随之出现。最初专注于非结构化数据，组织现在需要将结构化数据作为AI应用的知识来源。本次会议将展示一种通过AI代理同时存储和访问结构化和非结构化数据的方法。了解如何将文本数据放入向量存储并使用高级知识库创建文本转SQL系统，然后使用AI代理高效引导用户问题以获得流畅的用户体验。这种方法展示了如何利用结构化和非结构化数据源来增强企业环境中生成式AI系统的能力。
